snippet: The selection of Bill O’Brien, the Patriots’ offensive coordinator, as the Nittany Lions new coach has left players and some observers highly critical of the decision and process.
abstract: Penn State's selection of New England Patriots offensive coordinator Bill O’Brien as new football coach has left players and some observers highly critical of the decision and process.
lead_paragraph: The selection of Bill O’Brien, the Patriots’ offensive coordinator, as the Nittany Lions new coach has left players and some observers highly critical of the decision and process.

headline.seo: Former Penn State Players Unhappy With Choice of Bill O’Brien as Coach
headline.main: Penn State’s Choice of Coach Displeases Former Players
headline.print_headline: Penn State’s Choice Of Coach Displeases Some Former Players
